summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1723, for the improvement of Tenth Avenue Northeast, from East Sixty-fifth Street to Sylvester Place, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with wooden crosswalks and necessary drainage, under Ordinance No. 18244 and and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
